paper.title: K-Means Clustering Approach for Stock Risk Assessment and Portfolio Construction: A Case Study Based on the EU-EV Risk Model
paper.abstract: The purpose of this work is to explore the approach of K-means clustering for stock risk classification and efficient portfolio construction through a case study, using data from the PSI index from January 2019 to December 2022. The classification of stock risks will be based on the expected utility, entropy and variance (EU-EV) risk model. The methodology consists in applying K-means clustering with EU-EV risk related attributes to the stocks of the Portuguese PSI index in order to obtain two classes of stocks categorized with low and with high risk. Equally weighted cluster based portfolios are built for each risk class. The performance of these portfolios will be compared with the performance of portfolios constructed by selection of the best EU-EV risk ranked stocks.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用K-means聚类方法对股票风险进行分类，并基于风险分类构建投资组合。这直接涉及金融风险管理（通过EU-EV风险模型评估和分类股票风险）和投资组合管理（构建和比较不同风险类别的投资组合）。
